tasks.title: Clara: What are the health benefits and risks of souffles?
tasks.summary: What are the health benefits and risks of souffles?

messages.message: What are the health benefits and risks of souffles?

tasks.title: Alfred: How do I obtain a personal doctor without using the healthcare system?
tasks.summary: How do I obtain a personal doctor without using the healthcare system?

messages.message: How do I obtain a personal doctor without using the healthcare system? I have some special needs that require strict privacy.

tasks.title: Carl: I want to travel the world but I don't know where to start or where to go at my age.
tasks.summary: Somewhere like paradise would be good

messages.message: I want to travel the world but I don't know where to start or where to go at my age.
What kind of places are you looking to go to? Is there any specific continent you'd like to visit? Maybe somewhere near the beach or on the countryside?
Somewhere like paradise would be good

tasks.title: Lady: I do not get along with my daughter's step children. What is the least sinister way to get them out of my house?

messages.message: I do not get along with my daughter's step children. What is the least sinister way to get them out of my house?
How old are your daughter's step children? Do they live with you, or are they just visiting? I may be able to recommend some nearby daycare places. I'll need more specific information to help you.
I feel daycare is a little too merciful.
Would you like other recommendations?
